Package org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface TemporaryContentAPI

public interface TemporaryContentAPI
This API is for internal usage only. It is used to store temporarily uploaded files so that they can be seen by all nodes of a cluster ApiAccessType.HTTP mode is not supported as it is using InputStreams (XML serialization cannot work).

  • Method Details

    • storeTempFile

      String storeTempFile(FileContent fileContent)
      Store temporary content and return the temp file name
      Parameters:
      fileContent - file name and stream for the content
      Returns:
      a unique identifier for the file

    • retrieveTempFile

      FileContent retrieveTempFile(String tempFileKey) throws TemporaryFileNotFoundException
      Retrieve temporary content stored using storeTempFile based on the temp file name
      Parameters:
      tempFileKey - temporary file identifier
      Returns:
      a FileContent object containing the file name and stream for the content
      Throws:
      TemporaryFileNotFoundException - if there is no temporary content in the database for this key

    • removeTempFile

      void removeTempFile(String tempFileKey) throws TemporaryFileNotFoundException
      Remove temporary content stored using storeTempFile
      Parameters:
      tempFileKey - temporary file identifier
      Throws:
      TemporaryFileNotFoundException - if there is no temporary content in the database for this key
